title: Tiny Game Client Window
body:
So all of a sudden my game client window is tiny.  Like half the size it normally is.

It was perfectly fine and normal sized then suddenly it just changed itself to a miniscule size.

No changes made to any config files, I did absolutely nothing new or different than opening it and playing a game.

I cannot get it back to its normal size and there are no settings for adjusting window size either.

replies.body:
Unless you are currently using a 4k monitor which currently isn't supported, this issue could be due to a recent Windows update problem.  You can get this fixed up by adjusting your game properties through your OS:  Right click the LoL icon -> Properties -> Compatibility Tab -> Check the "Disable Display Scaling on High DPI Settings" Box.

Hope that helps!

Not using 4k monitor, no windows updates. Your suggestion didn't fix the problem. 

Eventually I just uninstalled and reinstalled LoL entirely and it's back to normal
